name: Avarice (itch) (williammohr)
description:
A powerful demon has been summoned... IN YOUR BASEMENT!? 

Feed him delicious coins and he may even grant your wish!

Avarice is a mostly light-hearted game that touches on the idea of loss.

Playtime is around 5-10mins. Enjoy!

*This game was made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023.
